Interupts.Name: Fierce Loyalty
Interupts.Trigger: The Wrangler or one of its summons adjacent to them is targeted by an ability or attack.
Interupts.Effects: The attack or ability is retargeted to either the Wrangler or the summon (Wrangler chooses which).

Actions.Name: Crack the Whip
Actions.Description: The Wrangler shoves all summons (hostile and allied) in range 3 3 spaces in any direction.

Actions.Name: Weakening Toxin
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 is pacified. Pacified foes take [fray] damage, which doesn't break pacified.

Actions.Name: Sic
Actions.Description: The Wrangler activates one of its beast summons, from the following list, using its summon action. If it's bloodied, it can activate all three. It must activate a different summon from the last each turn.

Actions.Name: Attack
Actions.Effects: Foe is poisoned. If foe is already poisoned, attack ignores vigor.
